name: Halo Sport Laser Tag Set of 2 - Gifts for 8 9 10 11 12 13 Year Old Boy Gifts Birthday - Easter Toys for Boys Ages 8-12 Years - Teens Boys Toys Age 8-10 Years Gift - Lazer Tag Guns & Vests
short_description: COMPLETE LASER TAG BATTLE SET: The Halo Sport Laser Tag turns any space into your personal battleground! Quick to set up, easy to play, and designed for both indoor and outdoor fun. Pick your teams, strap on your vests, grab your blasters, and get ready to battle with lights, sounds, and vibrations that make every hit feel real!

ADVANCED BLASTERS & VESTS: Each gun features an LCD life indicator, weapon mode selector, reload slider, team lights, and shooting FX. The sensor vests track every hit with their own LCD display, team selectors, and adjustable straps for a comfortable fit.

HEROSYNC & LCD TECH: Trying to remember the score is never fun, so your guns and vests pair together! Lives and team data are automatically synced, and LCDs on the vests and guns allow you to check your status, even in the heat of battle, without having to rely on lights or audio.
4 WEAPON MODES: Switch between Pistol, Automatic, Laser, or Rocket Launcher – each with unique sound effects and play styles. Change strategies on the moment to outsmart your opponents!
MULTIPLAYER ACTION: Join up to 4 different teams with unlimited players. All Halo Sport Laser Tag sets are compatible with each other, so you can expand the battle as big as you want.
INDOOR & OUTDOOR PLAY: With up to 125 feet of range, you can battle in the living room, backyard, or the park.
THE PERFECT GIFT: A thrilling way to get kids moving, playing, and bonding without screens. Great for birthdays, holidays, or family fun nights – a gift they’ll never forget.
WHAT’S INCLUDED: 2 Halo Sport Blasters and 2 Sensor Vests with adjustable neck and waist straps (requires 12 AAA batteries, not included). Simple setup gets you in the game fast!
